name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control
display_help: You can control darkness and shadow to disable your foes with negative energy. Enemies that are affected by many of your attacks will have their chance to hit reduced.

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Shadowy_Binds
powers.display_help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly

display_info: 5 ticks of 6.12 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 14.36 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 6.12 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
5 ticks of 2.05 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
20.00% chance for 1.0 immobilize for 18.63s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Dark_Grasp
powers.display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering from moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 11.17s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Living_Shadows
powers.display_help: You extend and animate your own shadow causing it to entangle all foes within a long cone pattern in front of you, rendering all affected foes immobilized. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 60° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: 3 ticks of 3.98 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 10.92 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 3.98 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
3 ticks of 5.46 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
50.00% chance for 1.0 immobilize for 13.97s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Possess
powers.display_help: You cause your targeted foe to be possessed by a dark entity from the Netherworld causing them to be confused for a short period of time. While confused they will be unable to tell the difference between friend or foe and will attack nearby allies. Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 confuse for 27.94s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Fearsome_Stare
powers.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 70 ft. radius 45° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 terrorize for 18.63s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Heart_of_Darkness
powers.display_help: In a burst of negative energy you overwhelm the minds of those around you causing them to be disoriented and suffer minor negative energy damage over a short time. Affected targets will also have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Disorient, -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

display_info: 5 ticks of 2.14 negative energy damage over 4.1s on target
5 ticks of 9.64 negative energy damage over 4.1s on target
5 ticks of 2.14 negative energy damage over 4.1s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
5 ticks of 4.82 negative energy damage over 4.1s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
20.00% chance for 1.0 stun for 13.97s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Haunt
powers.display_help: You summon a pair of Shades from the Netherworld to harass your target foe. Shades deal moderate damage and they terrorize their victims. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Shadow_Field
powers.display_help: You blanket a targeted area in darkness immediately holding foes within the field. Any foe who enters this area will have their chance to hit reduced and has a chance to be held for a short period of time. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Darkness_Control.Umbra_Beast
powers.display_help: You conjure up one of the most fearsome creatures of the Netherworld, the Umbra Beast. This creature will fight beside its summoner using its brutal claw, bite and darkness attacks. Recharge: Long
